title: Exploring Core Competencies of Library Instruction Librarians: Collaboration and Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library usage methods and experience with resource retrieval
context.additional_context: An online educational program linked with elementary school partners as part of a corporate social responsibility initiative.

learning_goals: Explain at least three key competencies of a library education librarian (collaboration, instructional design, leadership)
Evaluate educational materials based on subject-matter expertise using a rubric with 80% accuracy
Complete an educational scenario design project with peer learners using collaboration tools within the LMS
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
